name: Arbalester

skills.name: Spread Misery
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of transferring 1 random debuff from this Champion to the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Lethargy
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 60% chance of putting the target's skills on cooldown.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Soulbreak
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Damage increases according to the number of debuffs on the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
